description: Try our easy to follow Beef Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Beef,Peanut free
name: Beef Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup tomato sauce (or BBQ sauce, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large non-stick frying pan over a medium-high heat. Spray the burgers lightly with oil spray. Cook the burgers for 4 minutes each side or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil.
Add the onions to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes or until soft. Cut the Turkish bread into 4 serving portions and halve through the centre. Toast both sides.
Layer your choice of lettuce, beetroot and tomato, carrot and cucumber onto the bread base. Top with a burger and onions. Serve with the bread lid and sauce.
